li.a: Writing and Implementing Professional Growth Plan

div.p: The mission of Bogalusa City Schools is to be accountable to all stakeholders for providing a competitive education that empowers students to achieve academic and personal goals and to become college and career ready, productive, responsible citizens.
In the Bogalusa City School District, we strive to excel every day in our schools and classrooms...
